answers.answer: It's possible he may have diabetes, does the odor you are smelling from him seem 'actone' in scent?  That is one sign of diabetes.  Being thirsty quite frequently (more than average) is also a sign.  Also the frequent urination.  On the flip side, he may have some kind of drug problem going on.  It's kinda hard to say, but you may need to get more information, and just talk to him honestly, rather than 'jokingly'.  He might always just brush it off it seems like just a joke.  Good luck!
